Subbed Projects.Show Name: Arashi no Yoru ni: Himitsu no Tomodachi

Good Comments: Great job. Both great subs and video quality. Was really hoping someone would sub this, so a big thanks is in order ^^
Bad Comments: they put alot of work into their subs

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Hottarake no Shima: Haruka to Mahou no Kagami

Good Comments: Superb quality and some great subs to match.

They just do a great job!  Everything is understandable and timed well, and my friend who speaks Japanese says they are very accurate.
Also, they choose awesome Anime that sometimes no-one else will do.
excellent sub for an awesome CGI movie!
Bad Comments: No problems. After all, they're only ones doing it! Also, 720p may be coming later, that's great.

Good Comments: Good clear subs and quite reliable. Keep up that good work! :)
Bad Comments: It's always neatly typeset, the translation is easy to follow, and they make an effort to let the viewers know when they're diverging from the actual meaning for better effect.

Good Comments:
The one and only English fansubber for Kaiketsu Zorori episodes

Very good quality

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Majime ni Fumajime Kaiketsu Zorori: Nazo no Otakara Daisakusen
Nezumi Monogatari: George to Gerald no Bouken
Ookami Kodomo no Ame to Yuki

Good Comments: Only group to sub it thus far. Quality is passable; you get used to the sub font, there are a couple typos, and I have some minor translation complaints, but overall, a thumbs up.
Several nonsensical lines and obvious translation errors. Very poor translation and editing.
Do yourself a favor and go with Commie. Don't let these mediocre subs ruin a fantastic movie.
Basic errors in Japanese all over the place. "I don't remember my mother ever thinking about anything serious"? Really?

"Weather a nurse, a teacher, or a baker."
Loool
Bad Comments: Some minor translation errors. But this movie is easy to translate as expected of family movies and there are many extended scenes with no dialogue at all. Literal + honorifics but no ED translation.
Commie staff and fanboys upset just because another group subbed this. Classic Commie

Good Comments: They're the reason why I found the show in the first place.
